name: Adept4
description: Adept4 is a public company quoted on the AIM market of the London Stock Exchange. The Company is headquartered in Warrington, with offices in Leeds, Aberdeen and Brighton. Adept4 delivers IT as a Service to small and medium-sized businesses across the UK. ITaaS provides you with exactly the amount of technology link to Technology hub and support link to support you need in accordance with business requirements, billed on a monthly basis, based on what is consumed.
